title: I currently main Irelia and Mordekaiser, need champions with similar playstyle

replies.body: diana. i main both irelia and diana. akali is similar as well.
From what I gathered, i'm either giving renekton or vlad a shot.

Bruiser Rengar is very simular to irelia
Tank Rengar is simular to mord 

Renekton might be a good pick though, have a shot at him

> Zed seems sooo much similar, don't you guys think?
^
Zed seems sooo much similar, don't you guys think?

> I assume you mean for top lane right?

Top lane: Irelia
Mid lane: Mordekaiser
I only play zilean in norms

Morde is one of a kind though, if you really want someone who plays similar, I guess Vlad kinda fits?

For Irelia, maybe Fiora, but they build differently though.

I assume you mean for top lane right? Well both of those champs are bruisers who have a good mixture of damage and offence. So Hecarim, Fizz and Ekko are maybe some top laners to try out? Melee bruisers with backline diving potential.
